pipelines.name: yolov11s_1_cpu
pipelines.pipeline: {auto_source} name=source ! decodebin force-sw-decoders=true ! videoconvert ! video/x-raw ! gvadetect model=/home/pipeline-server/models/public/yolo11s/INT8/yolo11s.xml pre-process-backend=opencv device=CPU threshold=0.7 model-instance-id=inst0 name=detection ! queue ! gvaclassify model=/home/pipeline-server/models/colorcls2/colorcls2.xml model_proc=/home/pipeline-server/models/colorcls2/colorcls2.json pre-process-backend=opencv device=CPU model-instance-id=inst1 name=classification ! queue ! gvapython module=/home/pipeline-server/models/colorcls2/process class=Process function=process_frame ! queue  ! gvametaconvert add-empty-results=true name=metaconvert ! queue ! gvafpscounter ! appsink name=destination
